attributes.action: urgently review the situation with regard to granting residential rights to Gurkhas.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The present government position (albeit not shared by the majority of British people) is a shameful indictment on our country's attitude and additionally, is intolerable with regard to the conditions under which the Gurkhas are forced to exist.

I urge the present government to urgently review the situation with regard to granting residential rights to Gurkhas bearing mind, not only the debt of gratitude we owe them but as a demonstration that Great Britain continues to be a country that leads the way in evincing human rights.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
